title: Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning Guided by Signal Temporal Logic Specifications. (arXiv:2306.06808v2 [cs.AI] UPDATED)
abstract: Reward design is a key component of deep reinforcement learning, yet some tasks and designer's objectives may be unnatural to define as a scalar cost function. Among the various techniques, formal methods integrated with DRL have garnered considerable attention due to their expressiveness and flexibility to define the reward and requirements for different states and actions of the agent. However, how to leverage Signal Temporal Logic (STL) to guide multi-agent reinforcement learning reward design remains unexplored. Complex interactions, heterogeneous goals and critical safety requirements in multi-agent systems make this problem even more challenging. translated_title: 由信号时序逻辑规范引导的多智能体强化学习
translated_abstract: 奖励设计是深度强化学习的关键组成部分，然而某些任务和设计者的目标可能不适合定义为标量成本函数。在各种技术中，与深度强化学习集成的形式化方法由于其表达能力和灵活性而受到了广泛关注，可以定义代理的奖励和要求的不同状态和动作。然而，如何利用信号时序逻辑（STL）来引导多智能体强化学习奖励设计仍未被探索。多智能体系统中的复杂交互、异构目标和关键安全要求使得这个问题更加具有挑战性。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的基于STL引导的多智能体强化学习框架。STL要求被设计为同时包括每个智能体的任务规范和安全规范，并利用STL规范的鲁棒性值生成奖励。
tldr: 本文提出了一种基于信号时序逻辑引导的多智能体强化学习框架，该框架将任务规范和安全规范结合起来作为奖励的生成条件。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a novel STL-guided multi-agent reinforcement learning framework that combines task specifications and safety specifications as conditions for reward generation.
